description.en_US: Resist knockback and make a charged swing with an hexagonal axe.
Lunge forward and smash the ground with a hexagonal disc, stunning hit enemies.
Resist knockback and make multiple charged spins with an hexagonal axe.
Lunge forward and smash the ground with a spinning hexagonal disc, drilling at and stunning hit enemies.
Lunge forward with a bubble that breaks the guard of a single enemy before bursting.
Lunge forward with bubbles that break the guard of a single enemy before hurling the enemy into a massive bubble burst.
Use it to attack the darkness.
description.de_DE: Benutz es, um die Dunkelheit anzugreifen.
description.ja_JP: 闇に対する攻撃として使われる。

description.en_US: Throw a trio of wind orbs that block enemy projectiles and shoot piercing gusts at the enemy hit by the next charged shot.
Use it to vanquish the darkness. Inflicts a random stat penalty onto hit enemies.
Throw an octet of wind orbs that block enemy projectiles and shoot a flurry of homing gusts at the enemy hit by the next charged shot.
